general.title: General Information
general.description: Software developer focused on creating robust and scalable digital solutions. My priority is programming, system architecture, and code quality. I complement my technical profile with a solid capacity for teaching and communication, which allows me not only to develop efficient software but also to facilitate knowledge transfer and mentoring within development teams. I seek technical challenges where I can apply my Full Stack experience to build high-impact products.

skills.description: Main technical and personal skills acquired through my training and experience.

educationDescription: University and high school academic background, focused on software development, critical thinking, and teamwork.

details: Comprehensive training in software development focused on agile methodologies, modern system architecture, and creative problem-solving through digital solutions that positively impact users and organizations.

certificationsDescription: Certificates and achievements obtained during my professional training.
descriptionLanguage: Languages I speak and my estimated proficiency level.

workExperienceItems.description: Personalized tutoring for high school and university students in mathematics, physics, chemistry, basic programming, and logic. Development of teaching materials and practical exercises. Focus on active learning and computational thinking.

Development of a Web Application for therapy control, patient management, and clinical follow-up. Implementation of functionalities for user management, roles, and statistical reports using modern web development technologies.
Development of an institutional website for Casa de la Cultura Tungurahua, implementing a custom content management system (CMS) to facilitate site updates and administration by non-technical staff.
Development of a cross-platform app with Flutter and Firebase to improve order flow between dining room and kitchen. Participation in key interface and real-time communication features.

workExperienceItems.company: GITT System – Technical University of Ambato
workExperienceItems.description: Led a team of programmers in the design, development, and deployment of a web application for inventory management and loans at the Technology Workshop.
Led the development of a web system to view tourist destinations and connect with advisors via WhatsApp API. Implementation of purchase flow and direct contact.
Team coordination and functional design of an app to share information about missing persons and community support.

experienceDescription: Practical experience in software development, tutoring, project leadership, and teamwork.
contactsDescription: Main contact information: city, phone, email, and LinkedIn for professional or academic inquiries.

memoryGameDescription: Reflect on these lessons that life has taught me
memoryGameWin: You've discovered all my shared wisdom
memoryGamePhrases: We live twice: first ignoring that everything ends, second knowing each moment is unrepeatable
Silence is where important questions find their most honest answers
It's not storms that reveal who you are, but how you tend your garden when no one's watching
True mastery isn't in conquering the world, but understanding you never will
There's profound freedom in accepting that some chapters will never have closure
Time heals nothing; it only teaches us to carry wounds with more dignity
